Author: HyperionXtech
Title: [ANN] HyperionX - Peerion: The smart market ecosystem
Body: HyperionX is developing products to evolve the way the world thinks about economics through immersive experiences.  Peerion, the team's first project, is an incubator for entrepreneurs.  The platform offers a new and exciting way for anyone to become educated on, and begin using progressive technologies to formulate a self-sufficient lifestyle.  Hyperion's Gemunomics Framework creates game-like experiences to help users feel comfortable while operating modern day systems.  The incubation will give everyone the ability to earn a living and be free to pursue ideas, passions, and personal improvement, regardless of their socioeconomic status.  There will be new updates to Peerion MVP as well as a prototype released this month to offer an interactive walkthrough of what's to come.  Stay tuned!  #PlayWithPurpose #WithRootForce

Author: HyperionXtech
Title: [ANN] HyperionX - Peerion: The smart market ecosystem
Body: HyperionX and Peerion: A Smart Market Ecosystem for Business  HyperionX is integrating business agreements with blockchain through verified digital identities to bridge the gap between global business resources and entrepreneurs.  The Smart Market Ecosystem offers a secure decentralized environment for businesses to develop a marketplace and offer their products and services.  The first Smart Market in the Hyperion Ecosystem is Peerion.  The gamified peer-to-peer collaboration app will provide business tools for entrepreneurs to verify their skills, build teams, and grow projects. #WithRootForce  The minimum viable product, or MVP, is currently being developed and you can start your entrepreneurial journey on Peerion today!  Begin networking to find collaborators, exchange ideas for research, and level up as you grow your skills.  Join the mission on Peerion by visiting https://peerion.io/mvp and #PlayWithPurpose!

Author: HyperionXtech
Title: [ANN] HyperionX - Peerion: The smart market ecosystem
Body: We are proud to announce our latest partnership with the John P. Lowth Entrepreneurship Center, in the Sykes College of Business at The University of Tampa.  "Joining the Spartan Incubator program as a resident company is a huge stepping stone towards achieving our goals for Peerion." - Jeremy Klein, Founder of HyperionX  To view the entire article, please visit http://bit.ly/SpartanIncubatorPR.

Author: HyperionXtech
Title: [ANN] HyperionX - Peerion: The smart market ecosystem
Body: Hello. Peerion MVP will launched before the end of this month. It can currently be viewed on Github and our developers are adding the final touches to make it user friendly. We have already begun expanding globally. We have connections and ambassadors in multiple countries and we are working on opening HQ's in some of those locations. Our community across all social platforms, including registered to our platform, is over 50,000 members and it is continuously growing. At this time we are also acquiring partners and vendors to join us in the growth of Peerion.

Author: HyperionXtech
Title: [ANN] HyperionX - Peerion: The smart market ecosystem
Body: HyperionX is focused on reshaping how the world thinks about economics.  Layering global markets on top of a decentralized gameful framework, aimed to empower people through dynamic interactions, allows true borderless global autonomy to be established.  The framework called Gemunomics leverages blockchain technology to provide efficiency and scalability for individual to enterprise level solutions.  Through immersion techniques designed to create fluid interactions between autonomous entities, Gemunomics gives new meaning to free market.  Learn more at https://hyperionx.org

Author: HyperionXtech
Title: [ANN] HyperionX - Peerion: The smart market ecosystem
Body: The graphic is an example, and the pre funding phase continues until Whitelist begins: March 20.  We will have various tokens on the platform for many different purposes, the first two being Tree Token and Hyper Token. Think of Hyper Token as your VIP access pass to the Peerion Ecosystem. Tree Token is used for all transactions and Hyper Token is used to unlock many cool tools, dapps, features, games, competitions and more. You can read more about our tokenomics in our Whitepaper and more updates will be continually released.

Author: HyperionXtech
Title: [ANN] HyperionX - Peerion: The smart market ecosystem
Body: We appreciate your input.  HyperionX is developing a gamified platform to teach peers about future technologies, like blockchain. After a peer learns a skill, Peerion will offer the tools they need in order for them to use their new skills in the real world.  Based on the Whitepaper and the uniqueness of the Peerion Platform, there will continue to be ways for peers to collect rewards and utilize their tokens on the platform.  We will be offering a variety of Badges, Tokens, and Totems that will each have their own unique use case and can all be collected and utilized on Peerion.  To learn more visit https://peerion.io/

Author: sieemma
Title: [ANN] HyperionX - Peerion: The smart market ecosystem
Body: For some time now since I got some hyper tokens from your airdrop, I don't get anything again. What is happening?
